Source code for pyqt_live_tuner.application_builder

from typing import Optional, Tuple
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication
from pyqt_live_tuner import ParametersContainer
from pyqt_live_tuner import ConfigurationsContainer

import qdarktheme

from .main_application import MainApplication

_Application = QApplication([])
qdarktheme.setup_theme("dark")



[docs]
class ApplicationBuilder:
    """
    A clean builder that takes pre-constructed containers.
    QApplication is safely initialized inside.
    """

    def __init__(self, title: str = "My Application"): 
        self._app = _Application
        self.main_window: Optional[MainApplication] = MainApplication(title=title)



[docs]
    def run(self):
        """Build the main window and launch the app."""
        self.main_window.show()
        self._app.exec()
